config.control-panel-key.name: Control Panel Key
config.control-panel-key.description: Press this key when within range of a machine to open the machine control panel.
config.machine-select-key.name: Machine Select Key
config.machine-select-key.description: Press this key to open a selection menu for all machines in the game.
config.save-on-change.name: Save on Change
config.save-on-change.description: Automatically save changes when closing the control panel or when changing pages.
config.default-page.name: Default Page
config.default-page.description: Page of control panel to display by default.
config.open-machine-select-menu.name: Open Machine Select Menu
config.progression-mode.name: Progression Mode
config.progression-mode.description: On the machine select page, hide not yet obtained machines.
config.alt-question-mark.name: Alt Question Mark
config.alt-question-mark.description: Use a more visible question mark icon (previously the default).
config.prefetch-caches.name: Prefetch Caches
config.prefetch-caches.description: Preemptively cache relevant data to make menu open faster in game. Generally not an issue to enable, but another misbehaving mod can cause this mod to frequently reload the cache, leading to lag.
rule-list.footer-note: Only the host player can change machine settings.
machine-select.hidden-by-progression-mod: Not yet obtained machines are hidden due to "Progression Mode", disable it in config to see all machines.
iconic.machine-select.title: Machine Control Panel
iconic.machine-select.description: Open the machine selection menu for machine control panel.
